item.title: NP
item.author: Cyan
item.description: Summary 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 ____________________________________________________________ | Problem Type | Verifiable in P time | Solvable in P time | Increasing Difficulty ___________________________________________________________| | | P | Yes | Yes | | | NP | Yes | Yes or No * | | | NP-Complete | Yes | Unknown | | | NP-Hard | Yes or No ** | Unknown *** | | ____________________________________________________________ V * An NP problem that is also P is solvable in P time.
